about_the_game:
Get ready, Forest Warden, the island is under occupation. Use the powers given to you by the gods and destroy the enemies to save the island!

Your God Powers:
The three mainland gods have united their hearts and deemed you worthy of their power. But as a new Forest Warden, you can access new god forms as you slay enemies and grow stronger. Each god form has its own special powers and appearance. To have these powers, you must be a good warrior, Forest Warden!



Storyline:
As a new Forest Warden, you are in charge of the island's security and military. While you're traveling to the island's commissioning points to ensure the safety of the island natives, the queen, seeking revenge for her gods who were stripped of their powers and imprisoned by the mainland gods in the past, attacks the island with an invading army. You must ensure the safety of the islanders and protect the heart of the island with the island army. Along the way, you'll hear the stories of your universe and the Forest Warden himself as you fight against the queen's bloodthirsty army of invaders. Are you ready for this, Forest Warden?




Rest Areas:
After helping the villagers, would you like to take a break from the war and hear the story of the island where you live from the character? Help the islanders and enjoy the story. Remember that the first duty of the Forest Warden is to protect and help the islanders. Rest areas are a great way to give your game some breathing and relaxation time. They allow the player to get away from the combat and adventure and get to know the game's world and characters better.

Meditation Spaces:
Areas where you can refresh your character's health and listen to your character's life story. You can use these areas to get to know the Forest Warden better.




Environment:
The island's uniquely beautiful landscape is beginning to deteriorate as the invading army advances towards the heartland. The enemies have spread a virus on the island and over time it is spreading throughout the environment.

short_description: Forest Warden is a 2D action-adventure game. With the powers granted to you by the mainland gods, you must thwart the queen's invading army. As you gain experience, the gods will grant you new powers. But you have to be fast, as time passes the virus is taking over the island.
